sourcesContent:
import { AfterViewInit, Component, OnInit, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import { FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; import { FormControl } from '@angular/forms'; import { FormBuilder } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-dashboard', templateUrl: './dashboard.component.html', styleUrls: ['./dashboard.component.css'] }) export class DashboardComponent implements AfterViewInit, OnInit { @ViewChild('tempbutton') buttontemp:any; title = 'ClientCrud'; registrationForm : FormGroup; constructor(private fb:FormBuilder){ this.registrationForm = fb.group({}); } ngOnInit(): void{ this.registrationForm = this.fb.group({ name: this.fb.group(""), job_title: this.fb.group(""), bio:this.fb.group(""), email:this.fb.group(""), phone:this.fb.group(""), birthday:this.fb.group(""), gender:this.fb.group(""), profile_background_color:this.fb.group(""), active_profile_background:this.fb.group(""), is_public:this.fb.group(""), // name: new FormControl(), // job_title: new FormControl(), // bio: new FormControl(), // email: new FormControl(), // phone : new FormControl(), // birthday: new FormControl(), // profile_background_color: new FormControl(), // active_profile_background: new FormControl(), // is_public: new FormControl(), }); } ngAfterViewInit(): void { this.buttontemp.nativeElement.click(); } }
